about_the_game:
【Game Overview】

A simulation game where you subject a captive secret agent to rape machine training.
Event scenes are partially animated, and training screens are fully animated.
Each machine has 4 to 7 types of penetration, training, and climax variations!
Make full use of all 20 types of machines to take Agent Mirai over the edge!

[Other]
* This work includes depictions of brainwashing, human body modification, and pseudo-excretion (personality extraction).
* This work will include voice acting on the launch version exclusivley on steam.



【Story 1】

Secret Agent Mirai receives information that a certain pharmaceutical company is conducting illegal human experiments.
She heads to the company to do an undercover investigation on her own, but she is caught off-guard in their underground laboratory and captured.
In the underground laboratory, machine rape training is carried out by special machines, and Agent Mirai becomes a new test subject.




*No mosaic in full game.

【Training System】

On the training screen, you can select a machine and train Mirai.
To clear a stage, raise the degree of arousal and training, and finally, FINISH and obtain the orgasm level quota within the turn.

【Machine Development Tree】

You can unlock new machines using the points you get from training.
As the story progresses, the number of unlockable machines increases, and a total of 20 types of machines are available.

【Characters】

Mirai

A secret agent infiltrating a pharmaceutical company to investigate illegal human experiments.
She can use super-powered energy guns and barriers that stop bullets, yet somehow she still gets captured.

Aizawa

He got hired as a security guard through a relative's connection, and was attacked by Mirai on his first day on the job.
Long story short, he will be conducting machine rape training on the captive Mirai.
He seems to be good at shooting and playing cat's cradle.
He never gets a turn as a stunt cock.

Kaede Moro'oka

The head of the clinical trial taking place in the basement.
She seems to be conducting research on memory ejection.
You can ask her for advice and training tips.

Director

Director of the Institute.
He has created a number of sex machines, and will develop new machines in exchange for development points.
Basically a dirty old man.

【Story 2】

Human experiments on memory ejection were underway in the basement of the pharmaceutical company.
After receiving machine rape training, Agent Mirai is injected with a drug that drains memories.
What will become of her...!?

content_descriptors.notes:
All character depicted are over the age of 20.
This story includes depictions of brainwashing, human body modification, and personality extraction

Content Warning: the game contains Bondage and Hypnosis. This story includes depictions of brainwashing, human body modification, and personality extraction.

name: Agent Mirai and the Submission Machines

package_groups.name: default

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ 2 Duo E6600 or AMD Phenom™ X3 8750
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.

short_description: Secret Agent Mirai received information that a certain pharmaceutical company is conducting illegal human experiments. She headed to the company to investigate on her own but was captured. In the laboratory, there were numerous sinister-looking machines. What will become of her...!?
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
